name: Mania Jelly Pop 2018
description:
Mania Jelly Pop 2018 is a very latest addictive Pop game! Tap on three or more adjacent jelly to make them blast, create new high score is game winner!
Features:
- Almost 150 deliciously addictive levels
- Tap 2 or more same jelly to pop
- Pop more jelly each time, you will be rewarded
- Tasty and beautiful jelly graphics
- Easy to play, challenging to fully master
